1.content:
Cult
A cult has discovered a shrinking spell and are using it to make human sacrifices to their high priestess, who they wish to transform into a giant goddess. The only way to stop them may be if someone can escape their clutches and recreate the spell to make their own more noble giantess.

Evil Genius
A scientist has created a shrink-ray, but her evil assistant wishes to use it for her own selfish ends. What will happen when the evil assistant manages to reverse the polarity of the shrink-ray and transform herself into a Giantess? The only way to stop her may be if the scientist herself can escape and recreate her technology elsewhere...

Aliens
Aliens are exploring power dynamics in human society. How do they do this? By shrinking the powerful and enlarging the weak! But a government agent is hunting them intent on acquiring the technology for her own selfish purposes
1.title: Which Story?

11.content:
Deep underground robed and hooded figures meet by candlelight. They form a circle chanting in an ancient tongue facing a black altar stained with blood. One figure, taller than the rest, steps forward and lifts her hood revealing raven-black hair and pale skin. The woman is coldly beautiful, her eyes glinting of cruelty and blood-lust. She throws back her robe revealing her naked body, creamy white skin seeming to glow in the candlelight

A supplicant crawls towards her with a basket clutched under his right arm, squeaks of terror issue forth from within

'Offer up to my your sacrifice worm!' demands the tall woman, her crimson lips sneering as she speaks to the cringing underling

The initiate empties the basket upon the altar, tiny human shapes tumble forth onto the dried blood, each one stark naked and terrified beyond measure

The minuscule people begin shivering with fear and cold as they see the anonymous mob surrounding them. But only the high priestess has the honor of the sacrifice

She steps forward with murder in her eyes, her massive figure dwarfing the micros even further. They look up into her callous eyes over the swell of her perky breasts and see there is no mercy to be found within her soul

The high priestess begins the sacrifice as her congregation watches on in awe and fear of this woman and her power

She...
11.title: Giantess Cult

111.content:
"The children of this earth have served their purpose", she sayed as she watched the tiny human beeings shiver with fear. The Ice blue eyes of the High Priestress showed no hint of emotion at all as she stepped closer. "Like cattle fed them,...", She continued and simply swiped most of the people into her hand. Fresh red streaks on the altar showed where the unlucky ones, cought beneath her skin, stood. She lifted the fist full of micro people over her head and her open mouth. "... They will now feed you"

Her hand closed together with the resistance of a sponge. The thin bones where barely noticable to her as she shattered their bodies into each other. Greedily her tongue stuck out and catched the stream of blood flowing from her hand like from a fresh fruit. As pink and red meat squished through her fingers, she opened them and the blob of pulped bodies dropped into the moist cavern of her mouth. She immediatly swallowed.

A little spark seemed to appear in her eye. Just for a moment before it vanished again. But long enough to thinking you have imagined it.
111.title: Devours her sacrifice

1111.content: "They once watched over your world as its master..." She went on, showing the surrounding mob her bloodie hand and raising her voice as the murmured answer from hundreds of men and women came promptly as they all sunk down on their knees and lowered their heads. "..But now we shall growel at your feet" it echoed from the walls of the great cave. She wiped down the remaining micro people from the altar to the floor, not even watching how they fell and where they landed. Her attention turned towards a robed procession walking towards her. The 8 figures where wearing hooded cloaks which concealed their complete figur. Not even their gender was even guessable. They where carrying a cage on a bar. It was about a foot high and three foot long. Covered by a simple white sheet. In one fluid motion the cage and its inmates where revealed
1111.title: Continue the Ceremony

choices: A Victim is Captured for Sacrifice
A Spellbook is Stolen from a Library
112.content:
The priestess places her hands on either side of the altar and leans forward over it pushing out her chest, the swell of her enormous breasts takes the breath away from her congregants

Far below on the altar's surface the tinies stare up at the giant breasts looming above them, their screams redouble, they panic and rush around seeking to escape the altar, but there is no escape!

Slowly she lowers her breasts town onto the altar-top first knowing down the tinies then gently caressing them with her soft flesh, but slowly the pressure grows greater!

At first they struggle against her breasts tickling her, she giggles with cruel pleasure, but soon the weight is too much and they can't struggle

They're entombed in her warm skin, she pauses feeling the sensation of the tinies struggle to breathe beneath her breasts, she can feel them trying to squirm and gasp, the feeling is electric!

Then she leans more of her weight forward the squirming intensifies for a moment then she feels the first one POP! a tiny spot of warm liquid replaces it beneath her left tit as his guts are squashed from his puny body, the first sacrifice to HER glory!

The rest squish almost all at once! The high priestess grinds her breasts into the cold stone of the altar covering them with the blood of her sacrifices then she stands up and strides into the midst of her congregation

One by one they crawl to her and lick a small portion of the sacrifice from her body until she is clean and their lips are stained with the sacrificial blood

'I am your Goddess worms!' She yells raising her hands in ecstasy at her power over these pathetic men

'Goddess!' they repeat as one

'And soon I will be the Goddess over this entire WORLD!' she screams in ecstasy as they grovel at her feet
112.title: Crushes her sacrifice

114.content: What does she do to the sacrifice?
114.title: Other

info.description: A collection of modern-day GTS stories
